alert.note: Alert for Anchorage (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 28 at 6:57AM AKST until December 28 at 11:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM AKST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Anchorage. * WHEN...Until 11 AM AKST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Fog has developed early this morning with reduced visibility to a quarter mile observed across Anchorage north to Birchwood. Sudden drops in visibility are possible during the morning commute. Fog is expected to lift later this morning.
info.instruction: A dense fog advisory means visibilities will frequently be reduced to less than one quarter mile. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
